climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: ❤️【Warm Notes】- QUTOOL provides two different firmness memory foam pillows for your different prefer. This version is medium firmness neck pillow with comfortable support, while the other version is more softer and comfy. Please slect your favorite accordingly.

🌙【Contour Pillow to Relieve Neck and Shoulder Pain】QUTOOL ergonomic pillow follows the human natural cervical spine curve, providing impeccable sleeping support that disperses the burden on the head & neck. This multifunctional cervical pillow, features dual-sided usability for seamless flipping and personalized adjustments. It is an ideal choice for promoting a healthy sleep routine for side, back, or stomach sleepers, ensuring that you can luxuriate in a comfortable sleeping angle all night.

🌙【Premium Memory Foam, Never Flat and No Odor】- Made of CertiPUR-US Certified 3-5s Slow-Rebound Memory Foam, this cooling neck support pillow can ensure a refined and soft cool feeling that guarantees unparalleled comfort, providing good support to your neck, promotes muscle relax and eliminates neck, head, shoulder, and back pain. Completely devoid of any unpleasant odors.

🌙【Two Hights for All sleepers】- Harnessing the latest advancements in technology, our neck pillow comes with two height options, so you can choose the personalized height that you love. The ergonomic cervical design adapts to your body shape, distributing pressure evenly, and reducing discomfort caused by poor sleeping positions. Rest assured, it will provide you with a peaceful and rejuvenating sleep, leaving you invigorated and ready to conquer each day

🌙【Cooling Pillow for You】- With our Orthopedic Pillow, you can sleep comfortably and cool without having to toss and turn due to the heat. The pillowcase is made of ice silk fabric, which is skin-friendly and breathable. The mesh side is promoting great breathability. Furthermore, the perforated honeycomb design of the memory foam core better promotes air circulation, taking to odors and heat, allowing away you to enjoy a fresh pillow for a long time

🌙【Washable Cooling Pillow Cover】- The pillowcase boasts an exquisite pattern design, elevating its aesthetic appeal. The bottom of the pillow incorporates a convenient zipper design, effectively preventing accidental scratches and allowing for effortless removal and machine washable.

🌙【Buy Guaranteed】- QUTOOL neck memory foam pillows provide a good solution for cervical vertebrae problems and a worry-free shopping experience for customers. This soft cervical neck pillow is appropriate for elderly people, office workers, students, and all ages group for deep sleep. You can choose this super ergonomic pillow for yourself and those you are concerned about with confidence. If, for any reason, you are not satisfied with the cooling pillow, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Do you suffer from neck pain or headaches when sleeping? Are you turning over and over again and can’t fall asleep?

You Deserve A Good Night Sleep! HOW IT HELPS? QUTOOL ergonomical neck support pillow follows the natural curves of your body, which allows your cervical spine to stretch naturally, reduce the pressure on neck, back and shoulders, improve sleep posture to help you effectively relieve body pain and solve sleep problems.
Ventilated Gel Blue Memory Foam Pillow

DETAILS MAKE QUALITY Cooling, Soft, Breathable Ice-sliky fabric & mesh sides, skin-friendly, removable, washable, suitable for all seasons, no matter side or stomach sleeping won’t squeeze face. Blue Gel Memory Foam 3-5s slow-rebound memory foam ensures safety and durability. Feels like sleeping on a cloud, ideal balance between soft and support for neck shoulder. Durable Zipper Convenient zipper at the bottom, premium and smooth, effectively preventing accidental scratches. Quality Certification OEKO-TEX and CertiPUR-US Certified. Provide you with safe and comfortable sleep

2 Personalized Height in A pillow for Any Sleep Style Previous page Next page Have a QUTOOL cervical neck pillow equal to own a low pillow & a high pillow. The lower side is 3.9 inches, and the higher side is 4.7 inches. Solve the problem of often folding pillow to adjust the height, you can freely choose the high or low side by easily changing the direction.
Previous page Next page 1 Prepare Pillow 2 Washable Pillowcase

The orthopedic pillow is suitable for wide groups such as office workers, the elderly, teenagers, students to provide deep sleep. An excellent choice for Christmas Day, Mothers' Day, Fathdays' Day, Valentine's Day, or birthday gifts to express your care and love for your relatives and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ☁️ I'm Sleeping on a Cloud ☁️
reviews.reviewText: I first ordered two of these for my friends for Christmas. When they arrived, I was amazed by the quality and how comfortable they are. The quality of the memory foam and materials far exceeded my expectations.My friends absolutely love them.I couldn't help but to order one for myself. It arrived yesterday and last night, I got the best night sleep I've had in awhile with it. It's like sleeping on a nice, soft but supportive cloud. I have a habit of jerking my neck in my sleep in an effort to keep my head and neck supported.I didn't have to adjust my neck one time with it.I will say that I do put a small pillow underneath this pillow just because I like to have my head slightly elevated because it helps improve my airway and therefore my breathing.I definitely recommend this pillow 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Provides the correct amount of support for my head/neck
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased a couple of pillows that I thought would provide the support I need for my head/neck. Each time I was disappointed. I am happy to say that this pillow is exactly what I have been looking for. I've only used it a couple of nights, but I see no reason why I wouldn't continue to enjoy sleeping on this pillow. It's very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Due to having neck and back surgery, I needed good support on my neck. Secondly, I was told I have sleep apnea and snored. This pillow is good support for me. I can sleep on my left and on my right. I rarely sleep on my back now, so snoring is much less (my husband said so). The only discomfort is that it sleep warm/hot. It suppose to be a cooling foam but does not seem to cool at all. That is why I only gave it a 3/4 star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strange, but supportive pillow
reviews.reviewText: Normally I am a side-sleeper, but with a shoulder replacement needed, I knew I would be sleeping on my back for a few weeks. I primarily bought this pillow for the after surgery time period, but decided to try it out. I wish it was slightly softer for side sleeping (as the pillow I normally use for that is), but it is versatile for both. I would recommend this pillow. If you want to sleep either on your side or on your back, it is easy to switch the pillow around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Harder than I expected
reviews.reviewText: I love this style pillow, unfortunately this pillow is way too hard. I woke up with a headache.If you want a lot of support with very little give, you'll love this!If you want support but also softness, skip this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very firm, perfect for me
reviews.reviewText: I had a pillow very similar to this one that had become quite old and was breaking down, I bought this pillow to replace it. Honestly, this one is so much better. It’s more firm than my last pillow but still soft enough to cradle my head. The height works well for me sleeping on my back or side. It came vacuum packed and you need to let it ventilate for a day after opening. I don’t have any complaints so 5 stars from me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a wonderful pillow
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is unbelievable not only does it support my neck but it also keeps me cool. I love it and when this pillow wears out I will buy another one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for women.
reviews.reviewText: I bought for my husband, but the pillow wasn't tall enough to provide the support he needed. Works great for me though!
Really love how it supports my neck, stays firm. Good quality fabric. Happy with this purchase ☺️
Great pillow. Well made. Very comfortable. It provides support while still being comfortable. I sleep on my side and getting a good night's sleep with it.

I bought this as I am currently having neck issues and was hoping this would help.I am pleased to report some relief from this pillow. It is very firm, almost too firm to my liking, and holds the neck in place whether you are a back or side sleeper.

This pillow is worth every penny ! I sweat in the night and could find a pillow that kept me cool for one and did give me next pain. With this pillow all of my comfort has been answered, buying a second for my wife ! Thank you.
